thread.title: Female flight attendants forced into overhead bins in bizarre hazing ritual
thread.title_full: Female flight attendants forced into overhead bins in bizarre hazing ritual

title: Female flight attendants forced into overhead bins in bizarre hazing ritual
text:
Female flight attendants forced into overhead bins in bizarre hazing ritual Airline investigating hazing allegations 
It's hard enough fitting your luggage into those oddly-shaped overhead bins, but how about a person? Related Content 
According to a UPI.com post, Chinese airline Kunming is investigating allegations that female flight attendants were forced into overhead compartments as part of an industry hazing ritual. 
Photos surfaced on popular app WeChat that showed the flight attendants for the airline in the bins. 
Some of the workers reported feeling bullied into completing the ritual, according the UPI post. 
The WeChat post claims Kunming has long known about the ritual, according to the Washington Post. 
China holds female flight attendants to strict height and weight standards, reports the Post, with some airlines requiring their attendants to be no older than 24, or even requiring them to master kung fu. Distributed by LAKANA. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed. Recommended
